allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add EUR base currency toggle with PPP-based FX adjustments

- Add FXModel for currency forecasting using RA''s 30/70 PPP methodology
- Add BaseCurrency enum and asset-to-currency mappings in config
- Update CMEEngine to support base_currency parameter
- Apply FX adjustments to all asset classes based on local currency
- Liquidity and Absolute Return now use base currency T-Bill rate
- Add base currency toggle \(USD/EUR\) to sidebar
- Display FX impact on result cards when EUR base selected
- Show FX forecast section with EUR vs USD/JPY/EM breakdowns

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
